Name: cathode-ray tube production, cathode ray tube display | cathode-ray tube, cathode ray tube display | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/262:Manufacture of computers and peripheral equipment/2620:Manufacture of computers and peripheral equipment
Description: Average CRT production technology in the late 1990s. Average production composed of: production of the shadow mask, frame around the CRT, production of the cathode ray tube (i.e. coating of inner side, installation of electron gun & shadow mask, fixation of funnel and panel parts, evacuation) and paletting until the complete CRT are ready for the next production step.
